mapper.insert: insert into subscriptions (subscription_id, company_id, plan_id, billing_cycle, status, current_period_start, current_period_end, auto_renew, created_at, updated_at) values (#{subscriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentPeriodStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{currentPeriodEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{autoRenew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select subscription_id, company_id, plan_id, billing_cycle, status, current_period_start, current_period_end, auto_renew, created_at, updated_at from subscriptions where subscription_id = #{subscriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
